name: Puzzlehunt
body:
Have you ever wanted to create your own geocaching game? Well, we think geocaching is too easy - we want to make it a challenge.
![icon](https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7356/12155396935_eef07b1978_o_d.png)
Welcome the PuzzleHunt app. Make a a puzzle hunt - a location based scavenger hunt that requires the ability to solve riddles/puzzles to find the next location. Don't feel like making clues? We have some ready for you! We make it easy to make, manage, and play these game - all from the ease of your iPhone. ![Splash](https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5487/12155396845_f13a1ee602_o_d.png) ![Main Menu](https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3805/12155478685_588418b76c_o_d.png) ![Clue List](https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3735/12155473215_cd0ed3dd4a_o_d.png) ![Moderator](https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7443/12155477035_c601b133b7_o_d.png) ![Player Screen](https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7332/12155890154_3bc248217f_o_d.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
